html:
arrows/bows. Inasmuch as vineyards (7:23) and cultivated lands (7:25) will be gone, hunters, with their bows and arrows, will roam the land to seek their prey.

land shall become briers and thorns. The phrase briers and thorns occurs three times in this section. Because of the lack of cultivation and care for pasture, the land will become full of briers and thorns.
